short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a tab with the same URL already exists, TabRecycle will reuse it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabRecycle is a Chrome Extension that prevents users from opening the same URL multiple times. This extension achieves its optimising function by recycling tabs that are already open with the same URL. When you try to open a tab that is already open in your browser, TabRecycle recognises the duplicate URL and, instead of opening a new tab, it brings you back to the one already opened, “recycling” it. As a consequence, TabRecycle significantly reduces the number of tabs open and optimizes both your work and the performance of your device.
 
Features:
-       Shows the number of recycled tabs
-       You can pin the extension
-       You can enable/disabled the extension with one click
-       List of multiple opened URLs (in Option menu)
